## 984. HEAR
### Definition
To perceive sound with the ear, without necessarily paying attention to it. (Concepticon) Not to be confused with: (a) narrower terms like ‘occiput’, ‘crown (of the head)’, etc.; (b) ‘brain’, ‘mind’, etc.; (c) metaphorical ‘head’ > ‘top’, ‘chief’, etc. (GLD)

### Contexts
1. You speak too quietly, I cannot hear you. 2. Suddenly I heard a shot.
